price: Ní ọjọ́ tí A óò dojú wọn bolẹ̀ wọ inú Iná, (A ó sì sọ pé): Ẹ tọ́ ìfọwọ́bà Iná wò.
arabic: يَوۡمَ يُسۡحَبُونَ فِي ٱلنَّارِ عَلَىٰ وُجُوهِهِمۡ ذُوقُواْ مَسَّ سَقَرَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: yawma yus'ḥabūna fī al-nāri ʿalā wujūhihim dhūqū massa saqara
